definitions.definition: The total distance travelled in miles or in air miles .
The number of miles travelled by a vehicle on a certain volume of fuel .
An allowance for travel expenses at a specified rate per mile.
The amount of service that something has yielded or may yield in future .
examples: This old PC has still got plenty of mileage in it.
There’s quite a lot of mileage in language, speech and computing, particularly in research.
There’s some mileage in your argument.

definitions.definition: The total number of a person's past sexual encounters .

main_definition: The total distance travelled in miles or in air miles .
secondary_definitions: The number of miles travelled by a vehicle on a certain volume of fuel .
An allowance for travel expenses at a specified rate per mile.
( informal ) The amount of service that something has yielded or may yield in future .
( informal ) Something worth taking into consideration .
( slang ) The total number of a person's past sexual encounters .
